Index of /public/ftp/pub/Linux/system/mail

What you'll find here: send, receive, and route local, UUCP and Internet mail

You can also view this index in terse format, or return to the parent directory.

biffs/
programs to raise an alert when you have new mail
composers/
special-purpose mail composition programs
listservs/
software for managing mailing lists
mailhandlers/
various programs for handling mail
misc/
miscellaneous filtering and massaging tools for mail
mta/
mail transfer agents
mua/
mail user agents (general-purpose mail reader/composer software)
pop/
programs for remote mail service via POP or IMAP
qmail-unread-0.9.0.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1998-06-07
displays a summary table of all unread mail for qmail users (12242 bytes)
